content.html: I doesn’t need to be a 20% strict boundary, just giving teams the space and freedom to acknowledge when they need to spend some time on learning/research. That said, I’ve observed that without strict “rules” many folks don’t feel comfortable to take this type of time.
content.value:
I doesn’t need to be a 20% strict boundary, just giving teams the space and freedom to acknowledge when they need to spend some time on learning/research. 

That said, I’ve observed that without strict “rules” many folks don’t feel comfortable to take this type of time.
